attributes.action: stop the decline of our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Problems on the agenda are:

Perpetual state of fear from yob culture, lack of police presence, short term convictions for serious crime, lack of prison spaces, immigration that is out of control, state benefits problems, fraudulant MP's, lack of trust in the upper political levels, descrimination against the white working class, lack of a referendum on the EU constitution, underage drinking-smoking and sex, poor public transport on the verge of collapse, overcrowding the South East, migration away from this country, loss of social respect

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
